JUDGES: David Thór Björgvinsson;Giovanni Bonello;Lech Garlicki;Ledi Bianku;Mihai Poalelungi;Nicolas Bratza
TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . She is represented before the ORG by Mr T. Gertner , a lawyer practising in Bad LOC .

A summary account of historical events in which the present application originated can be found in the ORG ’s decision on admissibility in the case of ORG . PERSON GPE ( see ORG . PERSON GPE DATE . ) , no . ORG , DATE , § § DATE , ORG CARDINAL- ... ) .

The applicant ’s family owned QUANTITY of agricultural land in FAC and QUANTITY of land in PERSON . This region before and during the Second World War belonged to ORG . After the defeat of GPE at the end of the war , when the border between GPE and GPE was drawn along the PERSON - Neisse line , it was included in the territory of GPE ( see ORG . PERSON , cited above , § CARDINAL ) .

According to the applicant , on DATE NORP militiamen came to their house and told them that they were to be deported at once . They were given TIME to pack the barest personal essentials . They marched for DATE towards the Oder . They eventually arrived in ORG .
The applicant and other members of her family have still not been allowed to return to their home and have been refused restitution of their property .
A detailed description of the relevant international and domestic law is set out in the above - mentioned case of ORG . PERSON GPE ( ibid . § § CARDINAL - CARDINAL ) .
